title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A comprehensive guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones. Learn the science behind habit formation and practical strategies for lasting change.

title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: A captivating novel about a reclusive Hollywood icon who finally decides to tell her story to an unknown journalist.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A thought-provoking exploration of human history, from the emergence of Homo sapiens to the present day.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A magical novel about a library that exists between life and death, where every book is a different life you could have lived.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A powerful memoir about education, family, and the struggle for self-invention.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a psychotherapist determined to unravel the mystery of a woman who refuses to speak.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: The inspiring memoir of former First Lady Michelle Obama, chronicling her journey from childhood to the White House.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A philosophical novel about a young Andalusian shepherd who travels to Egypt after having a recurring dream.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: A science fiction masterpiece set in the distant future amidst a feudal interstellar society.

title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
description: A spiritual guide to living in the present moment and finding peace and fulfillment in life.
